title: Walk in closets, Satin nickel hardware throughout residence
posting_body: Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available
Amazing Apartments with an Amazing Location
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 925 Sq.
Enjoy peaceful living in a vibrant downtown setting at your new home.
Our community was designed for convenience and enjoyment.
We are surrounded by beautiful downtown Madison Heights with numerous restaurants, theaters, art galleries and more.
Oakland Mall is also just a short walk away and home to many brand-name shops.
You will immediately see why residents are drawn to our unique mix of peaceful living within a cosmopolitan setting.
- Well designed floor plans ranging from 825 to 925 square feet
- Beautifully designed kitchen featuring maple cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring
- Spacious living room, dining room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet
- Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors
- Walking distance to Oakland Mall, AMC Theater, and local shopping.
You may have a maximum of two cats in your home.
